routes.documentation: Send a JSON-RPC call to a localhost neblio-Qt or nebliod node

responses.label: Object containing the JSON response from the Neblio node.
Authentication information is missing or invalid

routes.documentation: Returns address object
Returns address balance in sats
Returns total received by address in sats
Returns total sent by address in sats
Returns address unconfirmed balance in sats
Returns all UTXOs at a given address
Returns block hash of block
Returns information regarding a Neblio block

responses.label: Object containing all information on a blockchain block

routes.documentation: Returns raw transaction hex

responses.label: Object containing raw hex of transaction

routes.documentation: Utility API for calling several blockchain node functions
Get node sync status
Broadcasts a signed raw transaction to the network (not NTP1 specific)

responses.label: An object containing the TXID if the broadcast was successful

routes.documentation: Returns transaction object
Get transactions by block or address
Information On a Neblio Address

responses.label: An object with an array of UTXOs for this address

routes.documentation: Broadcasts a signed raw transaction to the network

responses.label: An object containing the TXID if the broadcast was successful

routes.documentation: Builds a transaction that burns an NTP1 Token

responses.label: An object representing the tx to burn the token

routes.documentation: Builds a transaction that issues a new NTP1 Token

responses.label: An object representing the token created

routes.documentation: Builds a transaction that sends an NTP1 Token

responses.label: An object representing the tx to send the token

routes.documentation: Get Addresses Holding a Token

responses.label: An object containing all of the addresses holding a token

routes.documentation: Returns the tokenId representing a token

responses.label: Object containing the token symbol and ID, if token symbol does not exist on network, empty object is returned.

routes.documentation: Get Metadata of Token

responses.label: An object containing the metadata of a token

routes.documentation: Get UTXO Metadata of Token

responses.label: An object containing the metadata of a token for a UTXO

routes.documentation: Information On an NTP1 Transaction
Withdraws testnet NEBL to the specified address

responses.label: Object containing the transaction ID of the withdrawal.
